headline: DAT adds Shipper Spot Rate to the DAT iQ Platform for Better Broker Pricing Insights
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., September 03, 2025--DAT Freight & Analytics has introduced a new Shipper Spot Rate in its DAT iQ analytics platform that offers freight brokers unprecedented visibility into the shipper side of truckload pricing.
